name: Unfinished Business (doccsoccs)
description:
Description: Struggling to make ends meet, you find yourself in the employ of an odd group of lingering spirits. Join 'Unfinished Business' in their mission to free these lost souls; bound to this world by their ties to the living.

Features: 

  • A self insert
  • Delirious 3am writing
  • ~10,000 words
  • Classic reading gameplay
  • Lack of features

Content Warnings: strong language, topics of death

Team Members: doccsoccs (solo developer)

Voice Acting:

[Corduroy] - Joshkaposh (https://www.youtube.com/c/Joshkaposh)

[Beverlee/Nastasia] - Salamander The Newt (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-Ehrnw6OBDbbrTZDgj08pQ)

[MS] - BlindfoldActor (https://www.youtube.com/c/BlindfoldActor)

Font/Typeface: Dogica by rmocci at https://patreon.com/rmocci

Unfinished Business was made in one month for Spooktober 2022
